params.lendingToken: The address of the asset the commitment removal applies to.
params.marketId: The Id of the market the commitment removal applies to.

params.bidId: The bid id for the loan from TellerV2.
params.lendingToken: The address of the asset being committed.
params.marketId: The Id of the market the commitment applies to.
params.tokenAmount: The amount of the asset being committed.

params.lendingToken: The address of the asset being committed.
params.marketId: The Id of the market the commitment applies to.
params.tokenAmount: The amount of the asset being committed.

params._interestRate: The interest rate for the TellerV2 loan.
params._lender: The address of the lender of the commitment.
params._loanDuration: The loan duration for the TellerV2 loan.
params._marketId: The Id of the market the commitment removal applies to.
params._principal: The amount of currency to borrow for the loan.
params._tokenAddress: The address of the asset for which the commitment is being removed.

params._marketId: The Id of the market the commitment removal applies to.
params._tokenAddress: The address of the asset for which the commitment is being removed.

params._expiration: Expiration time in seconds, when the commitment expires.
params._marketId: The Id of the market the commitment applies to.
params._maxLoanDuration: Length of time, in seconds that the lender's capital can be lent out for.
params._maxPrincipal: Amount of tokens being committed by the lender.
params._minInterestRate: Minimum Annual percentage to be applied for loans using the lender's capital.
params._tokenAddress: The address of the asset being committed.

DeletedCommitment(address,uint256,addres.notice: This event is emitted when a lender's commitment has been removed.

ExercisedCommitment(address,uint256,addr.notice: This event is emitted when a lender's commitment is exercised for a loan.

UpdatedCommitment(address,uint256,addres.notice: This event is emitted when a lender's commitment is submitted.

acceptCommitment(uint256,address,address.notice: Accept the commitment to submitBid and acceptBid using the funds

deleteCommitment(uint256,address).notice: Removes the commitment of a lender to a market.

updateCommitment(uint256,address,uint256.notice: Updates the commitment of a lender to a market.
